title: Tesla Optimus
description: Tesla Optimus is a humanoid robot designed to perform general-purpose tasks, featuring advanced AI and dexterous manipulation capabilities for various applications from household chores to industrial automation.

title: Boston Dynamics Atlas
description: Atlas is the world's most dynamic humanoid robot, designed for research and development with exceptional mobility, agility, and the ability to navigate complex terrain and perform acrobatic movements.

title: ABB IRB 6700
description: The IRB 6700 is a high-performance industrial robot designed for heavy-duty applications including material handling, machine tending, and spot welding with exceptional precision and reliability.

title: iRobot Roomba j7+
description: The Roomba j7+ is an intelligent vacuum robot that uses advanced computer vision to navigate your home, avoid obstacles, and automatically empty its bin for weeks of hands-free cleaning.

title: SoftBank Pepper
description: Pepper is a social humanoid robot designed for human interaction, capable of recognizing emotions and engaging in conversations, perfect for customer service and educational applications.

title: Universal Robots UR10e
description: The UR10e is a collaborative robot (cobot) designed to work safely alongside humans in industrial environments, offering high payload capacity and precision for various manufacturing tasks.

title: Boston Dynamics Spot
description: Spot is a versatile quadruped robot designed for industrial inspection, data collection, and remote operation in challenging environments where traditional robots cannot operate.

title: da Vinci Surgical System
description: The da Vinci Surgical System is a robotic platform designed to facilitate minimally invasive surgery with enhanced precision, visualization, and control for surgeons.

title: LEGO Mindstorms EV3
description: LEGO Mindstorms EV3 is an educational robotics platform that combines LEGO building elements with programming to teach robotics and STEM concepts in an engaging, hands-on way.

title: Amazon Warehouse Robot
description: Amazon's warehouse robots (formerly Kiva) are autonomous mobile robots that transport inventory shelves to human workers, revolutionizing warehouse automation and efficiency.

title: Honda ASIMO
description: ASIMO is Honda's advanced humanoid robot, representing decades of research in bipedal locomotion, artificial intelligence, and human-robot interaction technologies.

title: Knightscope K5
description: The K5 Autonomous Security Robot provides comprehensive security monitoring with 360-degree HD video, thermal imaging, and advanced analytics for autonomous patrol and threat detection.

title: Waymo Self-Driving Car
description: Waymo's self-driving technology represents the forefront of autonomous vehicle development, using advanced sensors and AI to navigate roads safely without human intervention.

title: Xenex LightStrike
description: LightStrike is a germ-zapping robot that uses pulsed xenon UV light to disinfect hospital rooms and healthcare facilities, eliminating dangerous pathogens including superbugs.

title: Savioke Relay
description: Relay is an autonomous delivery robot designed for hotels and healthcare facilities, capable of navigating autonomously to deliver items while interacting politely with people.
